query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.id = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.name = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.price = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.quantity = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.weight = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.dimension = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.brand = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.details = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.description = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.image = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Product AS p WHERE p.categoryId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Product o

SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM Category AS c WHERE c.name = ?1

SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM Company AS c WHERE c.password = ?1

SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Oder AS o WHERE o.customerId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Oder o WHERE o.productId = ?1 AND o.customerId = ?2 AND o.status = 'Received'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Oder o WHERE o.customerId = ?1 AND o.status = 'Cart'
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Oder o WHERE o.status NOT LIKE 'Processing' AND o.status NOT LIKE 'Cart' AND o.status NOT LIKE 'Delivered' AND o.status NOT LIKE 'Awaiting for payment'
